item.description: About The start of all adventures Events Attacked by Canus from The Syndicate Birth place of the Cradle Snatchers
About Bordered by a ravine. Wolfkin and Mousekin claim the country was the invaded by something. The undead? A vengeful paladin? But the Wolfkin are fighting to get the country back Events

Churches Large Church to the Eldath in the center of a farming town Taverns The Boil and Youth Locations Badger Hill Cute little hillside with a taxidermy badger outside owner is Percival Events Hostage situation of the Church Trapped on Badger Hill
About Technological City. High poverty line contains slums. Events Find Breeze and their sister provide them with healing

About Gem of Aeresia Main market district of the continent Taverns The Golden Lion Posh Charity is the bartender They have coconut rum from Rauthei from a rabbit kin Events Ellianas was kidnapped by Granny Met Raffles the talking weasle
About Home of the rabbit kin

About The home of the Cradle Snatchers Members at the stronghold Percival Pink Panther Geralt of Rivania Corellien Merryweather Ratkin [[People/NPC/Cosine]] Creatures at the stronghold Pandalope called miss pandalopez Sharkpup called Hamilton Hellhound called Cheesecake Pig cocktail shaker
